alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 8:55PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Madison and southeastern Carroll Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Carrollton to Marble. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Green Forest... Withrow Springs State Park... Carrollton... Rudd... Marble... Forum... Osage... Rule... Rockhouse... Dryfork... Cabanal... Metalton... Connor... Coin... Alabam... Delmar... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
